<b><i>PRIORITY REPAIRS</b></i><br clear=left><b>[4] Crown Hts-bound trains run express from Bedford Park Blvd to 149 St-Grand Concourse</b>Day, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM, Monday, Apr 9 <br><br>No Crown Hts-bound service at <b>Kingsbridge Rd</b>, <b>Fordham Rd</b>, <b>183 St</b>, <b>176 St</b>, <b>Mt Eden Av</b>, <br><b>170</b>, <b>167</b> and <b>161 Sts</b>.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  width=80%><tr><td></font><font size=3><b>Travel Alternatives</b></font><td align=right>[TP]</table> <br></font>For service <i>to</i> Kingsbridge Rd, Fordham Rd and 183 St, take the [4] to Burnside Av<br>and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 176 St, Mt Eden Av, 170, 167 and 161 Sts, take the [4] to 149 St-Grand Concourse<br>and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av or Bedford Park Blvd and transfer to a<br>Crown Hts-bound [4].<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td>  [ad]  <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  </font></table><br><b><br>

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription: <b><i>Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection</i><br clear=left>[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead<br clear=left>[A] No rush hour service <i>to/from</i> Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b>All times, until Friday May 18, 2018<br><br>[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, <i>approximately every 20 minutes,</i> between <br><b>Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b> and <b>Beach 90 St</b> and via the [A] <i>to/from</i> <b>Far Rockaway-Mott Av</b>.<br><br>[A] Rush hour trains that were scheduled to operate <i>to/from</i> Rockaway Beach will operate<br><i>to/from</i> Euclid Av instead.<br><br>For <b>Broad Channel</b>, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.<br><br><b><i>Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:<br></b></i><a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/q052scur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Q52-SBS</font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/q052scur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Q53-SBS</font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/qm16cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>QM16</font></a> and <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/qm16cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>QM17</font></a> service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.<br><br><a href=http://www.mta.info/press-release/nyc-transit/nyc-transit-starting-subway-flood-protection-project-rockaways-next-month target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Click here</font></a> for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.<br><b><br>

Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  </font></table><br><b><br>
